name: Robreed: Flippin' Awesome
description:
Robreed wants to go on a journey and see the world, but his flying skills are not up to snuff. Help him get through 5 levels, using the environment to propel him, collecting gems, avoiding hazards and finding the exit in this innovative, single button pinball-platformer!

Robreed: Flippin' Awesome is in active development. More levels, better artwork, multiple worlds, a better tutorial and better difficulty progression are the main focus of my work at the moment.
